I like the time idea best...hey I thought Zardus had Megaton!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton was a Mutant creation of Maximal and Predacon DNA cloning 
created on
> earth by Veratis. Until then his only existence was as cells from 
the
> transmetal T-Rex Megatron and a large Maximal dragon named 
Necromancer.
> Since Veratis' past hasn't really been revealed as to where he got 
the
> protoforms he's been "Improving" (Experimenting on with a mutant 
virus which
> removes most signs of a robot form) I'm sure something can be 
worked out,
> maybe have Stallex attacked by a bot resembling Megaton. A 
resemblance of
> his former mode might exist through the DNA replication. This could 
open a
> rivalry between him and a few bots in the game. (Necromancer, 
Veratis,
> Megaton, just to name three.)
> Sound OK to you? either that or we'll just say a future temporal 
anomaly
> will send Megaton back in time to when Stallex was young but it 
hasn't
> happened to him yet. (If theres anyone who understands temporal 
physics
> please explain them to me, I'm getting a headache just thinking 
about it.)
